content.detailedDescription:
For 6-9 months, black triangular object appeared in the same location every night below ceiling in my bedroom, after i turned off the lights, motionless. its triangular shape blocked the blue illumination from an led night light that faintly illuminated the off-white ceiling. 

as i stared at the object and my eyes grew adjusted to the dark, i could see it was right below the ceiling level at approximately 9-feet above the floor of the bedroom. (my ceiling is smooth and painted off-white.) when i turned on the light it wasn't there, but when i turned off the light it was there again. this occurred between the hours of 10 pm to 4:00 am (approximately) every night for 6-9 months starting in january 2012 (approximately).

fear kept me from standing on the bed and trying to touch the object. it was perfectly triangular in shape and flat. i would stare at it until i fell asleep, wake up and stare at it again. i look at the ceiling area where it hovered now, and get goosebumps. when i turned on the light, i wondered if it was still there, invisible. i couldn't understand how something with apparent depth and mass could become completely transparent and invisible in light.

one night after 6-9 months it simply vanished. what gives me even more goosebumps and recalling this experience, is that when it vanished, the ceiling above it faintly glowed from the night light at the same ambient level as the rest of the ceiling. that made its former presence even more pronounced and real.

this is my observation of the phenomenon, which has not recurred since. i do recall the triangle was so dark and featureless, that i wondered if i could have stuck my hand through it, as if it were a triangular opening to somewhere. i was tempted to try but afraid of what might happen.
content.summary: For 6-9 months, black triangular object appeared in the same location every night below ceiling in my bedroom, after i turned off the lights, motionless. its triangular shape blocked the blue illumination from an led night light.

content.detailedDescription: I was about ready to go to sleep when i saw what i thought was an ambulance coming down the road. then the colored lights began to circle my home. i could see the reflection on the trees surrounding my home. as i lay there there was a buzzing or roaring sound in my head. i didn't hear it with my ears. it felt like my head was vibrating. then it was just gone.
content.summary: Appeared at 1st to follow road then hovered over my house.

content.detailedDescription: Observaci��n esfera se desplaza de sur a norte sobre calama(chuquicamata -chile)trayectoria con velocidad constante.Foma de pelota de tenis,color blanco y rojo.Fenomeno observado a las 22:00hrs.Duracion  de fenomeno 10 minutos,sin ruido.Observado por 3 personas.Pasa cercano un avion.
content.summary: Observación esfera se desplaza de sur a norte sobre calama(chuquicamata -chile)

content.detailedDescription: My sister and i were in her pool swimming we both saw the glowing object it last about 3 seconds. we saw this twice once in the west and 5 minutes later the same identical thing but in the east. the first sighting we only saw the light then it went dark. the second sighting we watched the light for a proxy 3 seconds then it went out but we're still able to track it for approximately 10-15 seconds. after that there was no more sightings.
content.summary: Two separate sightings different areas of the sky. lights only night time

content.detailedDescription:
Two of us decided to talk on the beach on a blanket. i took a spring vacation trip to the holiday inn on pensacola beach on santa rosa island; i went with a sorority....I was one of the elected male "sponsors", a sort of big brother while a senior in high school. so it was very structured and organized and chaperoned. we were chatting and i had been in the habit of looking for and spotting satellites. i saw a light travelling straight for the beach (north) i would say it was high, it was about a little bit smaller than venus, traveling in a straight line at a constant velocity faster than any plane or jet 
i had ever seen. then when it was overhead, it turned 90��west for a short distance with no change in velocity and then again, with no change in velocity, made another 90��turn south, where it had come from. at all times it travelled in straight lines at the same constant, faster than a private plane or known jet; it was a brilliant white light in the sky above pensacola beach in the spring of 1970.
content.summary: Larger than a star bright white light make two 90°turns w/no loss velocity on santa rosa island beach at night - sober

content.detailedDescription:
Me, and one other person were in a field in omaha nebraska in 1997 during the time when the hale bopp comet was making its circles around the earth while we were watching the comet i had a weird feeling coming over me like we were being watched. i had turned to my left and hovering above the tree line, was an object that i could not describe...

the first thing that i had noticed when i saw the object was the pulsating lights around the outer edge of the object. started changing rapidly from orange to red to red-orange.. then from the bottom of the object came a orb... at first i did not really know what i was watching at the time... i mean i had researched ufo's before this had happend to me hoping that i would eventually see one.. the object it self was silent... then i turned back to talk to my friends and a sudden sensation told me to turn back around... and standing no more than 2 feet from me was what had appeared to be a roswell gray.... it for some reason seemed to be communicating with me through telepathy.. i can recall to this day exactly what it had communicated to me. the figure said and i quote "i know you have been searching for the truth behind roswell and we are here and we have been watching...." it then turned and vanished.... the object itself hovered quietly over the treetops continuing to display the lights and orbs, then all of a sudden it was gone vanished before my eyes.. i was at the time more excited then scared i got an sense of ease had come over me like none before.
content.summary: When i saw this i was shaken yet excited

content.detailedDescription: Peavy cabin     sounds in the sky      nothing i could relate to     outlined in light(yellowish)  oval shaped    2 red lights either side of center w 3 green yellow lights outside each of those,   total surprise hollared at wife and daughter to get up and see,     went behind  mtn.            lots of small lites went into it while i saw it.     then after it went behind the mtn. the same small lites seemed to be going the other way.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Very large object silently floating by.Soon chased and recieving by 20 to 30 smaller than normal sattelite . then disappearing behind the mtn.  a half hr .Or so later .The same small lites reappeared  going away from the object(no longer visable)

content.detailedDescription: I saw a orange glowing sphere with two beams one eighth it size emitting out of it @ a 45�� angle for 20 to 30 seconds, called my son out to see it and he confirmed i wasn't crazy.
content.summary: Orange glowing sphere, emitting light beams at 45° angles 1/8 of size of object at the quadrants. in flight zone of metro airport never seen before, photo provided is area seen from looking ssw.

content.detailedDescription:
This picture was taken at the rear of the hotel san raphael. we were outside having a general discussion about the days events. as a semi-retired member of the national media, i always carry a camera. i noticed something up in the sky, shot the ufo and it then quickly disappeared.

this picture is one of many ufo pictures that were taken in the 2 weeks while in abadiania, brazil.

the other pictures i have are flying saucers.



cc: paul villadolie, hangar 1
content.summary: Illuminated image shaped with a half upside down airplane tail and other half unknown

content.detailedDescription:
We were outside in front of my house anda person we were with pointed out a red star appearence in the distance. then we were trying to figure out if it was a star and could not indentify it as what we knew. then it seamed to be moving downward towards us from the sw to se towrds my home. it then as it got closer split into two redish amber glowing orbs or lights that had a strobing appearence. the it stoped apx 100 or 150 over homarand sat w ith complete silence. the two lights went out 
las they went out it lit up in a long 30 to 50 ft greenish blueish flourencet glow. it hovered and i lnew this craft or beings were being watched. it stayed on the right side behind my yard hovered us for apx five or so minutes. then it slowly drifted from the right of my home to the left. it stopped and hovered again for apx 3 minutes. then tilted and as it did we saw it was a  disk shape and it drifted back to the south west slowly. as it did from the oter edges inwsrd it folded as disappeared. the whole duation
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Moved towards us from a red orangeorb, then two orage orbs, then lit up and craft change into an orange disk hovered over os moved ove my home then stoped hovered again. then changed back to sw direction the disapeared from outer edges tord inward ndb vi

content.detailedDescription:
Never reported this visual before.  may 23, 1989 my wife and two friends celebrating an anniversary were just returning to our hotel the zane grey located high on the hillside overlooking avalon and the pavilion.  there are a number of open terraces and i was standing on one higher than the others. they were looking up at me and i was looking at the view of the city.  from the right, the west, the ocean side i see a very bright ( brighter than a full moon ) circle, orb, about the size of a silver dollar held at arms length, moving toward the coast of long beach, ca. i seemed to be in the channel between catalina and the main land beach.  closer to the island.  my first thought was if that thing doesn't stop it will crash into the city of long beach.  all the time that i saw it was very low and moving in what seemed to be a straight level line over the dark ocean.  i believe it went into the ocean some where off the south east point of catalina island or vanished behind rises in the land at that end of the island...  my companions did not see it.  they were looking up at me and talking and by the time they turned to look it was gone.
i am a retired photographer, with 30 years in the aerospace industry and am very familiar and have photographed every aircraft imaginable and some not so imaginable.. and have never seen anything like that before or after.
content.summary: Observed bright glowing orb moving low over water of pacific and dissapearing off east end of catalina island

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my wheelchair on the ramp that's on the east side of my house,  in the morning of the 23rd waiting on a raccoon that had been killing my ducks and chickens.  at about 2.50 am i looked north into the woods and i noticed a fairly bright orange ball glowing through the trees. it resembled a full moon in size. it never moved at all. it just sat in the sky lightly pulsating. i was fixed on it, even though it was behind the trees. i could see it quite clearly, then it just faded out. i really didn't think too much about it until i seen an article from a woman in altoona, pa. she had a video and it looked so much like what i saw.  i was really struck with aw at it. it only stayed there for about 5 minutes. you couldn't help  but stare. i just wish it would have been there long enough to go grab a camera. but mine doesn't do so good at night. if anyone else has seen this glowing ball in my area ,  i would really like to know. thank you.
content.summary: I just saw it hovering through the trees. it was slowly pulsating then dimmed out. it was never there before.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and myself sat on a chair lakeside after dark. the sky was very dark. i noticed a star-like object moving in the sky, moving in ways that no known airship would be able to do. i then noticed 3 more of the same kind doing the same kind of moves. we continually talked, confirming what we were seeing. the objects moved at a speed that seemed impossible, given how far away they appeared to be. after each move each one would hover for a time, then move again.  we felt sure they were some kind if craft. they were too far away to notice any details. they looked bright, like large stars. after about 15 minutes they all came together and flew away. the effect was a swoop, something i had never before witnessed.  the next day we heard reports of sightings in three states, which made sense, as that corner of maryland is close to pennsylvania and west virginia. we didn't report our sighting because we were on our honeymoon and felt that we would not have been taken seriously. we were both excited and a little frightened as a result of the sighting. we were never able to doubt the existence of ufos after that experience.
content.summary: Objects moves independently and hovered, then came together and flew out of sight.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting a table at a golf-course waiting for my tee time.  i looked up in the sky, there was a mixture of sun and clouds.  i saw a clear bubble-like object moving across the sky.  i attempted to get my phone to video tape it but by the time i got it, it went into the clouds.  my golf partner arrived and i looked up again and i saw it again and said look! and she was not wearing sunglasses so the sun was in her eyes.  again it went into the clouds.  it seemed to be circling because i saw it again about halfway through it's circling and tried again to get my phone to video it, but it went into the clouds.  within about 5 minutes i saw 3 airplanes (not commercial) and a helicopter.  i want on the gold course and kept looking up but didn't see it or other planes again.  the object was like a glass sphere with an object in the middle of it.
content.summary: Clear transparent bubble-like  or glass sphere with object inside in the sky during daylight

content.detailedDescription: It was early evening on july 12, 2014. there were at least 40 or more family & friends at a outdoor going away party for my cousin going into the military. it was about 7:30 p.M when this strange looking object was spotted by my cousin & we all looked up to see this solid dark black object which looked like an upside down l. it glided across the tree tops without any sound. none of us knew what it was.? i tryed taken a picture with my iphone, it was at a distants but close enough for us to see it.  everyone could only guess at what it was!? it was strange!
content.summary: A fam/friend gathering outdoor party for my cousin going into military. there were 40 or more of us that witnessed the event.

content.detailedDescription:
It was during the first lights of the morning. it was very overcast. i normally make coffee and take a smoke outside my home. as i stood up to go back inside, i noticed an orange-yellowish light traveling through cloud cover. it traversed a distance of about 50 miles in about 15 seconds or less, all the while through low cloud cover. now the exact date , truthfully, i do not remember. however i found it strange enough to call kcra news room to report it, followed by laughter at their end. i believe ufo's are mapping the earth, for what reason is only conjecture on my part. possibly how harmful we can be, where our defenses are, what types of power sources and weapons we possess (spelling). as for the uso's, ...Food, quality of water(s), and possibility of terra forming.
    thank you, hope i'm not just an old fool and wasting your time.
     as a last note try a round magnet for propulsion and direction.
content.summary: Brighter than normal lights traveling thru clouds at high rate of speed

content.detailedDescription: Outside smoking a cigarette with witness jackie i turned to the n/w and observed a lot of individual looking lights. mainly low thin and broken with some stars seen in patches thru the clouds.. it was between 10pm to 11pm lasting maybe twenty minutes. first logical idea was a swarm of drones that i dismissed quickly because of the movement and flashing lights.  not sure of the cloud ceiling, low mostly cloudy w/broken patches,looking n/w we observed what turned out to be 36 seperate we think,seperate craft spread out ,moving relativly fast,120mph moving directly at us, maybe the closest 30 dg above horizon, then moved over us.In all some traversed maybe 60% of the sky. they moved all around each other with three lights, bright white,in a triangle shape, and one brighter white light that could be extremely bright in the center of each set of lights, craft? they flew around each other reminding several of us of fireflies,the middle light flashing seeming to interact with each other. other people where alerted and witnessed more or less the same thing with two exceptions. 1 out of the seven heard a low hum when they where overhead, six others did not hear or feel anything. one other witness reported seeing some structure between the lights while no one else did. before the objects came to be right overhead they bunched up and moved around one another, slowed some  moving on others hovering then slowly climbing. we noticed that there was some dimming but i expected more from the clouds, casting in to doubt rather they had truly been under the clouds, more so after seeing the milan italy vid 2 weeks later. this is very close to what we witnessed though the brightness was not as intense in our sighting. it was at the end of the video  that resembled what we saw with a shape and moving while interacting. not as bright as the ones in the vid but if they were in the clouds? what we observed however stuck to a basic course although clustering right over us then some stopping in some formations and rose slowly  others continuing to the s/e.One particular set of lights made up of 5 'craft' in a square formation one in the middle slowly rose and vanished. i now judge them to be higher than what i thought when i first observed them. they could have been in the thin clouds or above them. they for the most part spread out though some staying in position and slowly rose thill no longer in sight.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 3 lights steady in triangle shape w/bright pulsing light like a firefly in middle 36 objects in all

content.detailedDescription:
a girl and i were sitting in her balcony, we see a star-like light moving towards north, the object emitted a very sharp light and started glowing until it smoothly disappeared in the sky.

altitude was very high, we knew it couldn't have been an airplane , nor a star as stars are stationary according to what i read in physics, coudnt have been satellite , it was an unknown flying object that very randomly started glowing and giving out light, the light went slowly dim and the object disappeared into the universe. 

prior to this incident had i seen droplet lights falling like leaves and i have even seen a star-like light fading in the air at a very high latitude but i was alone then but the recent event i was not alone, giving me enough justification to share my story.
content.summary: Starlike object moving to right direction in a line emitting light.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were traveling n. on a county rd the sun was setting to the west ao it was approx 5 pm or so and as we looked toward the hills on  our left we saw this object come out of the hills and slowly start traveling w. but it was very shinny and as we got closer we pulled off to the side of the road there was a couple in a car behind us and they pulled oyer to but we never talked to them just as the object got real close the other couple got in their car and left my husband and i stayed and watched the object cross in front of us not more than maybe 5 ft. or so above the trees this object never made a sound and form that time on we really don't rewmember the same things other than being in our car heading n. again. we are both air force retired and both worked on several aircraft.
content.summary: We were traveling north we saw a shinny object come out of the hills on our right  & it traveled west

content.detailedDescription:
As i have been doing so every day and season for the last 4 years i was in my back garden taking photos of the sky using the rooftops and trees as reference. i photograph north,south,east and west for a few seconds in each direction and i'm only outside for about 5 to 10 minutes then i down load the pictures and check for anything unusual. i always find a lot of rods and orbs, sometimes together and a wide variety of unknown objects.
on the 23/7/14 i started at 3:00pm and took about 130 shots as usual there were rods appearing in some of the shots, i was half way through the 3rd session facing east at 16:22pm looking through the viewfinder and for a split second i felt as if something had moved towards me at the same time there was a flash on the viewfinder. i carried on taking photos in the same routine as normal then went in down loaded the pictures and found the photo of the rod that i had sensed 23-july-14 picture 92, and later taken at 16:24pm i found the one with the cylinder in the top right of photo 23-july-14 picture 133.
the reason i have been doing this is because since the age of 13 i have witnessed many strange objects in the area i live in, in 1996 i handed a video tape of an object that had appeared for the second night and had hung around for more than an hour to mufon it was analysed and classed as a ufo.
i also reported and submitted photos of objects around my area after some children i was with were pointed out hundreds of silver balls in the sky to the east on a blustery cloudy day that i couldn't see, that happened on 15/2/2010. 
a few days later my son gave me a 2 pixel camera and i have been taking pictures ever since i have hundreds if not thousands of pictures of these anomalies, 98 percent are taken during the day and i have discovered a lot about them, every year i notice a change in them some i can identify and they are not all random objects just passing by some have their own areas and are present daily. i am willing to share all of them with you.
content.summary: Long rods, low in sky mainly around my house

content.detailedDescription: This happened a long time ago but was so strange, as i was driving to work one dark morning as i came to a country max store i thought i saw a light move. when i looked i saw several round with domes lights. i then thought i had imagined the move. i (like a fool) even slowed down and was thinking oh what pretty lights country max had and couldn't understand why i had never seen them before. i even almost stopped they were so pretty. i talked about them all weekend as i couldn't believe i had never seen them as i drove it everyday for many years. i even asked my neighbor if she had noticed them as she came by later and she said no. that was on a friday morning. when monday came i said i have to look at them again. when i got to the store there were no lights just one single pole with a regular pole light on it. now i was confused so i stopped in there after work and wanted to know what happened to their pretty lights and they said the pole light was all they ever had. this is on a country road off a main highway by several feet. so i guess when i thought i saw the last light move into place it really did. i had seen several strange lights in the sky before this and was extremely frightened. so much that i drove very fast to get home. this time i wasn't at all because i didn't think they were ufo's. i am now so afraid of driving in the country late at night that i live in the city and wouldn't drive there ever again. i recently drove by there with my girlfriend in the dark but not late it brought it all back. this happened so long ago but you may have had other sightings like this over the years. i lost sight of the objects because i was driving away but kept looking back at them, they were just so pretty.
content.summary: Driving to work when observed lights hovering over building, i first noticed because out of the corner of my eye i thought i saw one move.

content.detailedDescription:
It was late night and i was having beer when suddenly light went off, a very common in india .
i came out of the house  cause of excessive heat in side couldn't bear it, so standing near to my car, i put my beer on the roof of the car and started staring at the moon. within seconds i saw some very power full light behind the moon (every thing brightened behing moon) like back light on the moon but in seconds light made a trail straight towards ne sky and went fast as possible. i have seen star but wasn't like a metroit. went in a straight path,and disappeared in a movement, but gave very power full light through it, whit, red, orange, yellow and goldenish in color. 
i stood without any emotion for some time then rushed in to get camera but never saw anything again for at least an hour or so....
content.summary: Stream of light very very bright behind the moon around 2 o.Clock am bright thrust and then kept going in same direction and light disappeared with in seconds

content.detailedDescription:
I took these two pictures on august 25, 2011 as i happened to be driving
past the gadsden regional airport in north east alabama. i hadn't seen the 
goodyear blimp around
the area for a few years, so i pulled into the airport accesss road and took
these two pictures. at the time i didn't realize that i had a little more
in the pictures than the blimp. to the left of the blimp in the pictures is 
some kind of machine thats digging a hole in the ground. i've never seen any
kind of industrial diqqing equipment that looks like this thing. they had been
installing the stuff out there at the airport to upgrade the airport for 
instrument only landings for heavy fog or at night. what's more interesting is
that there is something in one of the frames that's deflecting the dirt, like
it's hitting some kind of large solid object, that is apparently invisible. 
i took the two blimp pictures with my 2 megapixel samsung cell phone camera at
highest resolution. the blimp was in town for a few days because it was dodging
a possible problem with hurricane irene, i think. it was supposed to be in martinsville,
tn. to cover the nascar race that weekend but ended up here instead. the 
hurricane missed martinsville and the blimp left town the next day. gadsden
has a large goodyear plant where they used to hanger the blimps and do reasearch,
so the blimps still end up visiting here from time to time. 
i thought about this for a while and tried to figure some connection to fyffe
al. which is about 40 miles due north of here. the best thing i could come
up with is that both towns are about on the 86 degree of longitude west. if we
run that all the way around the world to the south we find that the line runs
through honduras and nicaragua, across the top of the vinson massif in 
antarctica, and straight into burma a little ways east of rangoon. from there
it continues up over the eastern himalayas into china and the soviet union. 
that's about all for these pictures. thanks for being a public access
information resource.
content.summary: Large and optically transparent

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were just outside (12:24 p.M.) taking a smoke break and were sitting in front of our carport when my husband said to look up as he saw a ufo.  at first all i saw was an airplane heading east out of sacramento.  my husband directed my attention to an object that appeared over our roof but was a distance away.  at first i thought this was just a plastic bag floating in the wind.  however the object was moving in circles, then moved off eastward for a bit, and then it started to circle again.  this object kept circling over and over again and was moving eastward as it circled.

i grabbed the camera and was trying to focus on the object to get photos but could not focus on it.  still watching this object, it continued to circle until another jet appeared in the sky coming from the sacramento airport heading east.  from where this object was, i would expect that the pilots would have seen this object.  the object stopped circling.  and then it moved off in a straight line heading west until it disappeared.

feelings and reaction:  it was an amazing sight to see and watch.  after seeing this i came into the house to upload the photos to see if i got anything, which i did not.  then i looked for someone to report this sighting to.
content.summary: Cicling ufo in clockwise rotation

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i have seen ufo���s five times, between 1980 and 1988. my wife has passed away 18 months ago, and i am 84 yrs old, i thought i should tell someone about this.

this was in buena vista co when we lived there. the ones i will tell you about are the two that we watched for four hours as we came home from town one evening as it was just getting dark, we lived three miles from town on five acres. as we came home we saw two big ufo���s above buffalo peaks, that is north east of are house. they had six windows above six windows on the bottom, the bottom six windows the lights stayed on all the time, the top six windows the light went back and forth from one end to the other, the whole four hours that we watched them. 
they where approximately seven or eight hundred feet above the mountains. it is hard to judge ten to fifteen miles away, there where five or six small white blinking lights coming from each ufo, they where flittering around the mountains, i have no idea what they where doing, or looking for, we never did notice any of them land on the mountain.
after four hours all the white lights went to the mother ships, and then everything went black, about 5 or 6 seconds later we seen two lights appear straight across to the east and about 2000 high, they looked like two small moons side by side just setting there, then they went dark again and where gone.

they say they still see ufo���s in buena vista, and salida co, salida is 2 5 miles south of buena vista.

about the other three ufo���s we seen i would have to talk to some one in person or on the phone since i am 84 and not very good on the computer
2
content.summary: Wife and i seen two large ufo's at dusk above buffalo peaks in buena vista co, between  1981 & 1988

content.detailedDescription: It started as an ex girlfriend tormenting me.As i got really mad it then turned into a black circular ufo with lights in a circle at the centre of the craft.I then was in a second room on board where i seen the ex girlfriend turn into holy mary typing on a computer.I then seemed to change from been beastly angry to been calm and quiet.It then dissapeared from sight.
content.summary: It started as an ex girlfriend then turned into holy mary on a computer

content.detailedDescription:
Over the 12 mile indiana aria several years ago there were numerous sightings of large objects at 1000 too 3000 foot all with bright white lights. they were there most nights for around a month. the lights were acompanied by the sound of fighter aircraft in the aria. 
  in the early hours of morning i was called to a customers sight to do electronic repairs. at several miles out and just before the intersection of sr25 and sr16 one of the objects was having problems staying in the air. i drove to within 1000 foot of the object at an altitude around 600 to 700 foot. the object had proportions compared to pop can. 
it had a definite sound of a small 4 stroke engine and propeller and appeared to be made of tile.

this object was man made and appeared to be a blimp. it was having problems and my speculation was it had something to do with radar. i watched the object for some time and then went on to the job. returning several hour later i returned to see the object over several miles to the east, still just  a few hundred foot up. 

 i did not investigate further as i did not want to explain myself to the military. i hope that this is not mistaken as someone just furthering a cover up but that is what it was. a blimp, military in origon, probably  radar related.
 

 this is not a question of ufo's but an explanation of sightings in the aria
at the time.
content.summary: Explination of sightings in aria

content.detailedDescription:
Bow hunting 2013 september 1st at an elevation of 10800 feet and very remote country.
an approaching storm had me worried about possible lightning when i noticed the object.
witnessed a strange object that hovered and changed directions while emanating some kind of plume under it. through binoculars it appeared to be a disc shape but it seemed to try and stay in the cloud formation.
was very large in size.
object seemed to hover then move slowly within and around cloud formation. 
after observing it for a few minutes it left a plume trail and caused the cloud area it passed through to have a trailing effect.
very weird and strange...
the most alarming thing was how large it was as i was over 1 mile away and it looked very large. really was not scared but more curious as to what it could have been.
ufo or natural i guess i will never know.
content.summary: While hunting i noticed a storm approaching and glassed it to see if i would need to head back to camp. as i did the strange object appeared in the clouds emenating some kind of plume under it.

content.detailedDescription: I took a gal to the movies and into the show management said we were being flown over by a ufo and it was not a hoax. there was a large military and police presence. we then were told to leave in an single file. as we left the military told everyone not to speak about this to anyone.The object was large and disk shape it moved slowly over the place it turned around very slowly as it went from east to west then it went over the aiport tower and hovered then it turned into a white ball of light and a small red light came out of it and flew around very fast. the object then flew strait up and out of sight. i told the gal i was with to look but she was so afaid that she put her head into her lap and cried. i said this was a chance of a lifetime and we might never get another one. it was like to plates on top of each other with atop that looked like a receses turned upside down,it had windows which were lite up and there was beings looking out.The craft was about 50-60 feet in the air.
content.summary: Large disk shape came over the drive-in movies

content.detailedDescription: Was in the back yard with two friends in east tacoma wa. midnight emptyienjoying bonfire when one friend notices a red orb hovering about 1-200 ft away to the east. it slowly started moving south about 5mph for 1 or 2 minutes then stopped, went up a few ft then faded and blinked out, didn't go anywhere just faded out.
content.summary: Red orb hovering then slowly moving south then fading and blinking out
